response.original_title: How to Hide Your Friends Body
response.overview: When two friends (Ted and Paul) accidentally overdose their buddy during a reckless day of partying, they scramble to cover their tracks and hide the body. In a desperate bid for help, they turn to their dangerous drug supplier (Vincent), only to find themselves ensnared in a web of chaos that forces them to confront the true cost of their choices.
response.title: How to Hide Your Friends Body
